name: accesskey
notices: can be also an array if multiple notices are necessary

values.value: one char out of utf-8 set
values.description: Make an element accessible via shortcut. This element consists of a space-separated list of characters.

name: class
notices: can be also an array if multiple notices are necessary

values.description: Make an element accessible via shortcut. This element consists of a space-separated list of characters.

name: contextmenu
notices: can be also an array if multiple notices are necessary

values.description: If the id of an :menu is given to use as the context menu for this element

name: data-*
notices: can be also an array if multiple notices are necessary

values.description: This element can be used to store proprietary data on HTML elements. E.g. data-username="Jhon"

name: dir
notices: can be also an array if multiple notices are necessary

values.description: Indicates the text flow direction of an element's text. ([ltr=left to right][rtl=right to left][auto=Browser decides how to handle inner text])

name: draggable
notices: can be also an array if multiple notices are necessary

values.description: Determine if the element can be dropped via the Drag&Drop API [true=yes][false=no (default)]

name: hidden
notices: can be also an array if multiple notices are necessary

values.description: Tells the browser not to render an element having the attribute set

name: id
notices: can be also an array if multiple notices are necessary

values.description: Defines an identifier which must be unique in th whole document

name: lang
notices: can be also an array if multiple notices are necessary

values.description: Defines the language of a non editable element or the language editable elements should be written in

name: style
notices: can be also an array if multiple notices are necessary

values.description: Here CSS styles can be applied but it's more recommended to separate concerns and store CSS in dedicated files via :link or using the :style and avoid the use of this element

name: tabindex
notices: can be also an array if multiple notices are necessary

values.description: Determine if an element can take an input focus b
